altername_name: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique 3: Styling Star
name: Style Savvy: Styling Star
overview: Make over up-and-coming singers, actresses, models, and more to inspire them to stardom and awaken their inner fashionistas! As a boutique manager, you'll style customers' clothes, make-up, nails, and hair in this fully outfitted game with 20,000+ fashion items to earn. Share your ideas online with other players and take the fashion world by storm!
